name: Nate's Place Backpackers
description:
Looking for a fun, modern, and social place to stay in Sydney? Nate’s Place Backpackers is the perfect choice!
Whether you're here to meet new friends, explore the city, or just relax in a beautiful space, we’ve got everything you need for an unforgettable Sydney adventure. Located in the heart of Darlinghurst, Nate’s Place is just minutes from Kings Cross Station and close to all of Sydney's major attractions.

Here’s what you’ll love about us:
Prime Location – Central to Everything
•	Kings Cross Station is just a short walk away, giving you easy access to Sydney’s top sights, restaurants, cafes, supermarkets and bars.
•	Bondi Beach is only 20 away by public transport – enjoy the sun, surf, and scenic coastal walks.
•	Darling Harbour, Hyde Park, and the CBD are just a quick ride away.

Our Amazing Hostel Features:
•	Stunning Rooftop with Harbour Bridge Views
•	Mixed Dorms & Female-Only Dorms – Choose from our modern, comfortable mixed dorms or female-only dorms, all equipped with individual lockers (BYO padlock), and comfy beds
•	Free Wi-Fi throughout the hostel to stay connected
•	Free Sim Cards
•	Full equipped kitchen
•	Modern and stylish male and females bathrooms with hair dryers and straighteners 
•	TV Room with Netflix, games and books
•	Laundry facilities available to make your stay even more convenient 
•	Multicultural and friendly staff ready to help you and welcome you in your own language ;)!
•	Free maps and sim cards available at reception
•	24/7 CCTV in all the common areas to make you feel safe during your stay


Free Daily Events & Social Vibes
We love bringing people together, so we’ve got a packed calendar of social events every day of the week!
•	Friday BBQ Party – Enjoy a delicious BBQ with vegetarian options
•	Sunday Pancakes – Start your Sunday with free pancakes to fuel your adventures
•	Free Club Entry – We offer free or discounted tickets to some of Sydney’s best nightclubs so you can enjoy the nightlife scene without breaking the bank
•	… and much more! – Regular events such as themed nights, group outings, rooftop hangouts, and more to meet other travelers.

Travel Made Easy
•	Exclusive Travel Discounts – Get access to great discounts on tours, activities, and trips across Australia.
•	Travel Advice – Our travel agency team is always happy to offer travel tips, and recommendations for you to plan your Australian adventure.


Booking & Check-in Information:
Reception Hours:
•	8:00 AM – 8:00 PM daily.
•	Late check-ins available until 2:00 AM via our night warden on duty.
Check-in & Check-out:
•	Check-in: From 2:00 PM
•	Check-out: By 10:00 AM
Booking & Payment Policies:
•	Minimum Stay & Peak Periods:
o	A minimum 3-night stay is required during peak periods (Dec 30, 31, and Jan 1), and these bookings are non-refundable.
•	Booking and Payment Terms:
o	Non-refundable bookings: Full payment will be charged before arrival to secure your reservation.
o	Pay-on-arrival bookings: A charge for the first night will be processed 24 hours before arrival, with the remaining balance payable at check-in.
•	Cancellation Policy:
o	48-hour cancellation policy: Cancellations made at least 48 hours prior to check-in will not incur a charge. Cancellations made within 48 hours will incur a charge for one night’s accommodation.
o	No-shows and cancellations within 48 hours will result in a charge for one night’s stay.
o	Changes to bookings must be made at least 48 hours prior to check-in and are subject to availability.
•	Guest Requirements:
o	Guests must be 18 years or older to stay.
o	A valid passport or Australian ID is required at check-in.
o	We do not accept groups of 8 or more people.
•	Payments:
o	We accept Visa, MasterCard, and cash (1.9% surcharge on card payments).
o	Key deposit: A refundable $20 key deposit is collected at check-in.
________________________________________
Book your stay at Nate’s Place Backpackers today and experience Sydney like never before!

houseRules.notes:
All guests are required to present passport upon checking-in.
We accept cash, EFTPOS, VISA, or MasterCard.
1.5% surcharge on all card payments

PLEASE NOTE:
Guest will be able to check-in during Front Desk opening hours from 14.00 to 20.00, after reception trading hours the night manager on duty will check guests in until 2am, please call the number which is displayed on the front door.

We only accept guests aged over 18 years old holding a valid international passport or ID. 
48 hour cancellation policy: All bookings cancelled at least 48 hours prior to check-in will not be charged. Bookings cancelled less than 48 hours prior to check-in will be charged a cancellation fee equivalent to one nights accommodation.

If you have made a reservation for more than one person, although we will try our very best, we cannot guarantee that you will be allocated beds in the same room. Please notice we are not accepting any groups bigger than 8pax. 

Check-in is available from 2 pm and check-out is 10 am. Luggage storage is available and guests can continue to use our facilities on the day of check out.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
